SEARCH
Package com.app.service

Interface ProductService

All Superinterfaces:
CrudService<Product>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductServiceImpl
public interface ProductService extends CrudService<Product>
Interface for managing products. Extends the CrudService interface to inherit basic CRUD operations for Product entities. This service provides additional methods for adding products, filtering products, and retrieving product categories.

      Adds multiple products.
      Parameters:
      productsDto - the list of DTOs containing the product data to be added
      Returns:

    • getProductsByCategory

      List<Product> getProductsByCategory(String category)
      Retrieves a list of products by their category.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • filterProducts

      List<Product> filterProducts(ProductsFilterDto productsFilterDto)
      Filters products based on the provided filter criteria.
      Parameters:
      productsFilterDto - the DTO containing the filter criteria
      Returns:
      a list of products that match the filter criteria
